'''25w09b''' is the ninth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.5]], released on February 27, 2025,<ref>{{snap|25w09b|id=b|February 27, 2025}}</ref> which fixes numerous rendering bugs and crashes in the [[Java Edition 25w09a|25w09a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=25w09a
|;prev
|280302|Text does not render in menus until entering a world.
|280303|Game crashes when trying to render a warden.
|280305|GUI elements incorrectly overlap on macOS.
|280308|Crash from GL error when opening world.
|280310|The game crashes near a trial chamber.
|280322|Game crashes when trying to render a breeze.
|280324|Game crashes when entering the End from the Nether.
|280329|Game sometimes crashes when saving a world.
|280334|The Report Player screen is broken.
|280346|The loading screen initially appears black and only changes to red at the end.
}}</onlyinclude>
